channel.title: apple on Neil Grogan
channel.description: Recent content in apple on Neil Grogan

item.title: Apple / EMI Deal - Thank the EU?
item.description: I heard the news one hour before it was announced: Apple and EMI are going Digital Rights Management (DRM) free, albeit at a slightly higher cost and quality. One of my pet hates is people who bash the European Union, often citing I will admit its not glowing charachteristics. These same people never admit the things Europe does right, which may well be this hopefully landslide affect against destroying DRM. To quote The Register:

item.title: Wiki goes live, downtime and Macbook Back!
item.description: I have a Wiki for messing about! I haven’t found a purpose for ityet, but I’d like to have it all set up incase one day I turn out to need it (maybe for collaboration or something?). If you have any skill at themin’ MediaWiki (the most popular wiki software, run but Wikipedia, no less) please, please get in touch! I would do it all myself, but my time is constrained at the moment, but I will eventually do it myself I suppose ;-)
